    • Uses of GameLogic in maze.io

      Methods in maze.io with parameters of type GameLogic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int GameIO.loadGame(GameLogic game, java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads to a given GameLogic the game in the file with the filename: "fileName".sav
      int GameIO.loadMaze(GameLogic game, java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads to a given GameLogic a game in the file with the filename: "fileName".maze The difference to the method above is that this one reads only the maze and the elements (hero, sword, etc...)
      int GameIO.save(GameLogic game, java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String extension)
      Saves a given GameLogic to a file with the extension '.sav'.

    • Uses of GameLogic in maze.logic

      Methods in maze.logic with parameters of type GameLogic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dragon Hero.checkIfFoundAnyDragon(GameLogic game)
      Returns any instance of Dragon if it has been found by the player (distance between them <= 1).
      void Hero.GeneratePos(GameLogic game) 
      void Element.GeneratePos(GameLogic game)
      Generates a valid random position for an Element.
      boolean Moveable.isValidMove(int x, int y, GameLogic game)
      Checks if an Element is trying to move to a valid position.
      void GameLogic.loadMaze(GameLogic gameLogic, java.lang.String mazeFile) 
      void Moveable.move(GameLogic game, int direction)
      Moves and Element in the board in the given direction
      void Hero.update(GameLogic game)
      Updates a hero: - checks for found eagle; - checks for found sword; - checks for dragon encounters; - check for found exit.
      void Eagle.update(GameLogic game)
      Updates an eagle: - if the hero has the eagle - calls the update position with the hero's position; - moves the eagle to the sword or back to the hero; - checks if the eagle finds he sword or gets killed by a dragon.
      void Dragon.update(GameLogic game)
      Updates a dragon: - calls setDragonState(); - randomly moves the dragon; - checks for found swords by the dragon.
